entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:46 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 10 except 6 near Lake Huron. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the morning. High 10 except 6 near Lake Huron. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:46 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
